name: Hearth Keys
description:
Hello, Welcome to Hearth Keys our entry for the global game jam, it's a game that was made in under 48hours as we've started working on pretty late, we've tried to polish the main mechanics and the loop of the game to a maximum we may upload some new updates later. 

The game is a kind of a puzzle game mixed with a shouting game the art is inspired a little bit from Among us and we hope that you will enjoy the plot twist of the game it will be interesting to discover how to finish the game.

If you have any feedback please let us know.
